db:abstract.db:para: This example creates a widget similar to QLabel, that elides the last visible line, if the text is too long to fit the widget's geometry.

db:article.db:programlisting:
# Nokia Qt Examples: elided label example
QT += core gui widgets requires(qtConfig(combobox))
TARGET = elidedlabel TEMPLATE = app
SOURCES += \ main.cpp\ testwidget.cpp \ elidedlabel.cpp
HEADERS += \ testwidget.h \ elidedlabel.h
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/widgets/elidedlabel INSTALLS += target
